author: Little Chinese Everywhere
description:
This video is a bit different from what we normally do. After receiving so many questions about traveling in China, we thought it would be helpful to share some practical tips based on our own experience.

0:00 Intro
1:46 Setting up your phone
3:30 VPN
5:00 How to pay
6:34 Hotel Booking
10:36 Car Rental
12:37 Food
14:00 How expensive is it?
14:57 Traveling China without speaking Chinese
